game.name: Buried
game.shortDescription: You wake up buried alive. You are running out of oxygen and you can't remember how you got here. There must be a way out, can you figure it out in time?
game.shortDescriptionEn: You wake up buried alive. You are running out of oxygen and you can't remember how you got here. There must be a way out, can you figure it out in time?

reviewHighlights.text: Wish it was a little longer but great game when on sale
I really enjoyed this. There isn't much replay value, but I'd still recommend it. It is a short game, as intended, but I think if the puzzles were ran...
